name: ha-crud-api
description: Home Assistant CRUD REST API for managing Lovelace dashboards

tools.name: ha_list_dashboards
tools.description: List all Lovelace dashboards in Home Assistant. Returns an array of dashboard metadata including id, url_path, title, icon, mode (storage/yaml), and visibility settings.

tools.name: ha_get_dashboard
tools.description: Get metadata for a specific dashboard. Use 'lovelace' as the dashboard_id for the default dashboard.

dashboard_id.description: Dashboard URL path (e.g., 'my-dashboard') or 'lovelace' for the default dashboard

tools.name: ha_get_dashboard_config
tools.description: Get the full configuration (views, cards, etc.) of a dashboard. This returns the actual dashboard content that defines what users see.

dashboard_id.description: Dashboard URL path or 'lovelace' for default

tools.name: ha_create_dashboard
tools.description: Create a new Lovelace dashboard. Requires admin privileges. The url_path must contain a hyphen (e.g., 'my-dashboard').

url_path.description: Unique URL path for the dashboard. Must contain a hyphen (e.g., 'my-dashboard', 'home-view')

show_in_sidebar.description: Whether to show this dashboard in the sidebar

require_admin.description: Whether only admins can view this dashboard

tools.name: ha_update_dashboard
tools.description: Fully update a dashboard's metadata (title, icon, etc.). Requires admin privileges. Cannot modify YAML-based dashboards.

tools.name: ha_patch_dashboard
tools.description: Partially update a dashboard's metadata. Only provided fields are updated. Requires admin privileges.

tools.name: ha_update_dashboard_config
tools.description: Replace the full configuration (views, cards) of a dashboard. This is how you upload dashboard JSON content. Requires admin privileges.

dashboard_id.description: Dashboard URL path or 'lovelace' for default

config.description: Dashboard configuration object containing views array and optional settings

views.description: Array of view objects, each containing cards

tools.name: ha_delete_dashboard
tools.description: Delete a dashboard. Cannot delete the default 'lovelace' dashboard or YAML-based dashboards. Requires admin privileges.

dashboard_id.description: Dashboard URL path to delete (cannot be 'lovelace')
